mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.unit AS "unit", a.unit_id AS "unitId", a.year AS "year", a.month AS "month", a.name AS "name", a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.level AS "level", a.sum AS "sum", a.jb_salary AS "jbSalary", a.jb_grade_salary AS "jbGradeSalary", a.gj_sum AS "gjSum", a.jiaban_allowance AS "jiabanAllowance", a.jingxian_allowance AS "jingxianAllowance", a.zhiqin_allowance AS "zhiqinAllowance", a.jkby_allowance AS "jkbyAllowance", a.telephone_fee AS "telephoneFee", a.mobile_fee AS "mobileFee", a.jszr_allowance AS "jszrAllowance", a.nv_hygiene_fee AS "nvHygieneFee", a.only_child_allowance AS "onlyChildAllowance", a.fangshu_allowance AS "fangshuAllowance", a.xinfang_allowance AS "xinfangAllowance", a.gonggai1993_allowance AS "gonggai1993Allowance", a.xizang_allowance AS "xizangAllowance", a.high_altitude_allowance AS "highAltitudeAllowance", a.xinjiang_allowance AS "xinjiangAllowance", a.sar_allowance AS "sarAllowance", a.township_allowance AS "townshipAllowance", a.linshi_allowance AS "linshiAllowance", a.guojia_19 AS "guojia19", a.guojia_20 AS "guojia20", a.guojia_21 AS "guojia21", a.guojia_22 AS "guojia22", a.guojia_23 AS "guojia23", a.guojia_24 AS "guojia24", a.guojia_25 AS "guojia25", a.guojia_26 AS "guojia26", a.guojia_27 AS "guojia27", a.guojia_28 AS "guojia28", a.guojia_29 AS "guojia29", a.guojia_30 AS "guojia30", a.guifan_sum AS "guifanSum", a.working_allowance AS "workingAllowance", a.living_allowance AS "livingAllowance", a.gaige_sum AS "gaigeSum", a.zhuzhai_allowance AS "zhuzhaiAllowance", a.zhufang_allowance AS "zhufangAllowance", a.wuye_allowance AS "wuyeAllowance", a.jiaotong_allowance AS "jiaotongAllowance", a.gaige_allowance AS "gaigeAllowance", a.gaige_6 AS "gaige6", a.gaige_7 AS "gaige7", a.gaige_8 AS "gaige8", a.gaige_9 AS "gaige9", a.gaige_10 AS "gaige10", a.reward_sum AS "rewardSum", a.chengwu_allowance AS "chengwuAllowance", a.xianlu_allowance AS "xianluAllowance", a.anquan_allowance AS "anquanAllowance", a.jingshen_allowance AS "jingshenAllowance", a.jingcha_allowance AS "jingchaAllowance", a.gongwuyuan_allowance AS "gongwuyuanAllowance", a.jiangke_allowance AS "jiangkeAllowance", a.reward_8 AS "reward8", a.reward_9 AS "reward9", a.reward_10 AS "reward10", a.reward_11 AS "reward11", a.reward_12 AS "reward12", a.reward_13 AS "reward13", a.jianyuan_allowance AS "jianyuanAllowance", a.gongzi_allowance AS "gongziAllowance", a.year_end_awards AS "yearEndAwards", a.baoxian_sum AS "baoxianSum", a.base_yanglao__allowance AS "baseYanglaoAllowance", a.zhiye_allowance AS "zhiyeAllowance", a.base_yiliao_allowance AS "baseYiliaoAllowance", a.buchong_yiliao_allowance AS "buchongYiliaoAllowance", a.shengyu_allowance AS "shengyuAllowance", a.gongjijin AS "gongjijin", a.personal_income_tax AS "personalIncomeTax", a.where_gonganju AS "whereGonganju", a.where_gonganchu AS "whereGonganchu", a.department AS "department", a.personnel_type AS "personnelType", a.is_logo AS "isLogo", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_org_id AS "createOrgId", a.create_id_no AS "createIdNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_org_id AS "updateOrgId", a.update_id_no AS "updateIdNo", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN affair_labor_office o ON o.id = a.create_org_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO affair_salary_gather( id, unit, unit_id, year, month, name, id_number, level, sum, jb_salary, jb_grade_salary, gj_sum, jiaban_allowance, jingxian_allowance, zhiqin_allowance, jkby_allowance, telephone_fee, mobile_fee, jszr_allowance, nv_hygiene_fee, only_child_allowance, fangshu_allowance, xinfang_allowance, gonggai1993_allowance, xizang_allowance, high_altitude_allowance, xinjiang_allowance, sar_allowance, township_allowance, linshi_allowance, guojia_19, guojia_20, guojia_21, guojia_22, guojia_23, guojia_24, guojia_25, guojia_26, guojia_27, guojia_28, guojia_29, guojia_30, guifan_sum, working_allowance, living_allowance, gaige_sum, zhuzhai_allowance, zhufang_allowance, wuye_allowance, jiaotong_allowance, gaige_allowance, gaige_6, gaige_7, gaige_8, gaige_9, gaige_10, reward_sum, chengwu_allowance, xianlu_allowance, anquan_allowance, jingshen_allowance, jingcha_allowance, gongwuyuan_allowance, jiangke_allowance, reward_8, reward_9, reward_10, reward_11, reward_12, reward_13, jianyuan_allowance, gongzi_allowance, year_end_awards, baoxian_sum, base_yanglao__allowance, zhiye_allowance, base_yiliao_allowance, buchong_yiliao_allowance, shengyu_allowance, gongjijin, personal_income_tax, where_gonganju, where_gonganchu, department, personnel_type, is_logo, remark, create_by, create_org_id, create_id_no, create_date, update_by, update_org_id, update_id_no, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{unit}, #{unitId}, #{year}, #{month}, #{name}, #{idNumber}, #{level}, #{sum}, #{jbSalary}, #{jbGradeSalary}, #{gjSum}, #{jiabanAllowance}, #{jingxianAllowance}, #{zhiqinAllowance}, #{jkbyAllowance}, #{telephoneFee}, #{mobileFee}, #{jszrAllowance}, #{nvHygieneFee}, #{onlyChildAllowance}, #{fangshuAllowance}, #{xinfangAllowance}, #{gonggai1993Allowance}, #{xizangAllowance}, #{highAltitudeAllowance}, #{xinjiangAllowance}, #{sarAllowance}, #{townshipAllowance}, #{linshiAllowance}, #{guojia19}, #{guojia20}, #{guojia21}, #{guojia22}, #{guojia23}, #{guojia24}, #{guojia25}, #{guojia26}, #{guojia27}, #{guojia28}, #{guojia29}, #{guojia30}, #{guifanSum}, #{workingAllowance}, #{livingAllowance}, #{gaigeSum}, #{zhuzhaiAllowance}, #{zhufangAllowance}, #{wuyeAllowance}, #{jiaotongAllowance}, #{gaigeAllowance}, #{gaige6}, #{gaige7}, #{gaige8}, #{gaige9}, #{gaige10}, #{rewardSum}, #{chengwuAllowance}, #{xianluAllowance}, #{anquanAllowance}, #{jingshenAllowance}, #{jingchaAllowance}, #{gongwuyuanAllowance}, #{jiangkeAllowance}, #{reward8}, #{reward9}, #{reward10}, #{reward11}, #{reward12}, #{reward13}, #{jianyuanAllowance}, #{gongziAllowance}, #{yearEndAwards}, #{baoxianSum}, #{baseYanglaoAllowance}, #{zhiyeAllowance}, #{baseYiliaoAllowance}, #{buchongYiliaoAllowance}, #{shengyuAllowance}, #{gongjijin}, #{personalIncomeTax}, #{whereGonganju}, #{whereGonganchu}, #{department}, #{personnelType}, #{isLogo}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, #{createBy.office.id}, #{createIdNo}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateBy.office.id}, #{updateIdNo}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE affair_salary_gather SET unit = #{unit}, unit_id = #{unitId}, year = #{year}, month = #{month}, name = #{name}, id_number = #{idNumber}, level = #{level}, sum = #{sum}, jb_salary
